div.p: Tag historically used within BIOGRAPHY or WRITING REVISIONDESC , filled in in the course of checking a document back into the system after working on it. It has subtags of DATE (the date of checking in) and ITEM (which holds an additional description, if needed, of work done) and attributes RESP (which holds the initials of the team member concerned), WORKSTATUS and WORKVALUE. WORKVALUE offers the choice of I for incomplete, p for pending (i.e. complete but for some particular unsolved issue), and c for complete. WORKSTATUS offers a list of categories: SUB for submitted, RWT for researched, written, and tagged, REV for revised, CFB checked for bibliography, CFT checked for tagging, RBV checked by one of the editorial team (volume author), PUB publishable, and ENH, enhanced (for additions and revisions after publication).
